title: Text Face
summary: Simple Android Wear watch face that displays the current time in words.
description: A watch face for Android Wear that displays the time formatted as text. Both the text color and background color are customizable, as well as the font used.Planned Features:Use any image as a background
descriptionHTML:
A watch face for Android Wear that displays the time formatted as text. Both the text color and background color are customizable, as well as the font used.

Planned Features:
Use any image as a background
comments: Seems to be a problem with the date format in this face. It puts it in a weird month/day/year, which is quite unusable.
Need improvements Overall good. Please increase line spacing a bit. Have option to change font and size
Nice So far it's the only watch face I like.
Very nice looking human readable face
recentChanges: Added option to show date on watchface
